project_tech_stack.text: Main website: Craft CMS, Twig, JavaScript ES6, SASS, Laravel elixir. Checkout App: Prismic, React JS, JavaScript ES6, SASS, Redux, Jest, Enzyme

project_main_text.text: Pod Point are the UK's leading provider of electric vehicle charging. Based on some initial designed pages, I built the main website into flexible components in Craft CMS so that the marketing team have the freedom to curate new pages themselves. From this I created a UI Toolkit to enable consistency of styling across all the products including the new React Checkout App for the homecharge checkout flow on the website.
